title: Al-Qaida Group Claims Responsibility In 'Charlie Hebdo' Attack
teaser: Audie Cornish speaks with Bruce Hoffman, director of Georgetown University's Center for Security Studies, about al-Qaida in the Arabian Peninsula.
contentencoded:
Audie Cornish speaks with Bruce Hoffman, director of Georgetown University's Center for Security Studies, about al-Qaida in the Arabian Peninsula and the group's claim of responsibility for the recent Charlie Hebdo attack in Paris.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
